Combat
Hit Points: 109 Initiative: 3 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword; Simple
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Greatclub (+9 1d8+3); Mace (+9 1d6+3); Shortbow (+7 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+9 1+3)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Lightly Armored: Armor Proficiency (Light)
Rakish Audacity: +2 Initiative/Use Sneak Attack w/out Adv vs. solo foe
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Ambush Master: Adv on Initiative, allies gain Adv on attacks on foe struck in first turn for 1 rd
Cunning Action: May use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide 1/rd
Durable: Regains a minimum of 4 HP from a Hit Die roll
Elusive: Attacks on self never have Adv
Eye For Weakness: +3d6 HP Sneak Attack during Insightful Fighting
Fancy Footwork: Attacked foe cannot make OA against self for 1 rd
Insightful Fighting: Insight vs. foe Deception gives Sneak Attack w/out Adv for 1 min
Master Duelist: Reroll miss with Adv 1/short rest
Master Of Tactics: R30' Help as bonus action
Misdirection: Use Reaction to redirect attack on self to creature providing self cover
Sharpshooter: Suffers no Disadv on attacks at long range/Range attacks ignore 3/4 cover/May suffer -5 attack w/a ranged weapon to gain +10 damage
Skirmisher: Use Reaction to move half speed when foe comes w/in 5'
Sneak Attack: +10d6 damage on attacks w/Adv or shared threat
Stroke Of Luck: May change a miss into a hit or take an automatic 20 on an ability check 1/short rest
Sudden Strike: Extra attack can use 2nd Sneak Attack on different foe
Uncanny Dodge: May use Reaction to reduce damage taken from an attack by half
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 10; Strength: 3; Wisdom: 6
Save Notes:
Slippery Mind: Save Proficiency (Wisdom)
Evasion: Successful Dexterity save yields no damage instead of half; failure yields half damage
Soul Of Deceit: Immune to telepathy and truth compulsion, use Deception vs. Insight to present false thoughts
